ownershipSetup.angorasixDesc: Let AngoraSix automatically track and calculate ownership based on contributions, with built-in governance tools for decision-making.
ownershipSetup.externalDesc: You're opting out of the AngoraSix ecosystem and will handle ownership tracking and calculations using your own systems or tools.

financialSetup.angorasixDesc: AngoraSix will help track, manage and distribute project earnings automatically with smart contracts and shared wallets.
financialSetup.externalDesc: You're opting out of the AngoraSix ecosystem and will manage finances and payouts using your own payment systems or traditional banking.

tooltips.ownershipSetup: Select whether AngoraSix should help you manage and calculate ownership based on tracked contributions.
tooltips.financialSetup: Select whether you want AngoraSix to help track, manage and distribute project earnings.
tooltips.ownershipViaTasks: Configure how contributions to tasks translate into project ownership. All settings here are defaults that can be overridden per task.
tooltips.governance: Set up decision-making rules and voting mechanisms for your project. A "Coordination Group" is a team of members responsible for daily operational decisions.
tooltips.profitSharing: Configure how project earnings will be distributed among contributors based on their ownership shares.
tooltips.currencies: Select which currencies your project will support for payments and profit sharing.
tooltips.distributionTrigger: Define the conditions that will trigger a vote on whether to start distributing profits to contributors.
